thread.section_title: Snowcountry Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Snowcountry | snowcountry.eu
thread.title: John McQuade

author: John McQuade
title: John McQuade
text:
I ordered a pair of skis in the middle of a Wednesday afternoon. Shortly after, I received a phone call to check the sole length of my ski boots to ensure the bindings would be fitted correctly. The bindings were fitted the same afternoon and the skis dispatched the same day and delivered on Friday morning, less than 48 hours from ordering. That is what good service is all about.
And the price was excellent as well!
